p:
FRAP assay is a widely used antioxidant assay that uses antioxidant substances as reducing agents in a redox-linked colorimetric reaction, wherein Fe 3+ is reduced to Fe 2+ at acidic pH that results in a formation of a coloured ferrous-probe complex from a colourless ferric-probe complex
35 . In this assay, the electron donation capacity (reflecting the electron transfer ability) of the examined compounds is evaluated.
